nws_periods.name: Overnight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 77. West wind around 5 mph.

nws_periods.name: Monday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 97, with temperatures falling to around 93 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 111. West wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
